exp.title: SDET
desc: Working as a Software Test Engineer in Ascendon's Core Engineering Team, focusing on API automation testing using *C# .NET* and leveraging microservices, cloud, and DevOps tools such as *AWS*, *Azure*, *Docker*, and *Terraform*.

exp.title: Intern
desc: Acquired good knowledge in technical (backend), functional, and business aspects of Ascendon, with a strong understanding of its various domains, architecture, features, and overall product.

exp.title: Frontend Developer Intern
desc: Worked on building portfolio website using *React*, *HTML*, *CSS* and *Javascript*.

exp.title: Web Developer Intern
desc: Designed responsive frontend components for a school website utilizing *React*, *HTML*, *CSS*, *JavaScript* and backend with *Django*.

projects.title: .NET Web API
projects.description: A .NET Web API for managing e-commerce products and categories. Implemented Role based Authorization using *JWT* that prevents certain users from accessing API endpoints.

projects.title: Gym Management System
projects.description: A Full Stack Gym Management application implementing *CRUD* operations, Pagination and Authentication for managing data of Gym Members, Trainers Equipments

projects.title: Sorting Visualizer
projects.description: A sorting visualizer to visualise Bubble Sort, Selection Sort, Merge Sort and Quick Sort.

projects.title: Leaf Disease Detection using CNN
projects.description: A web app to detect potato leaf blight disease using CNN. Made using Flask, Tensorflow and OpenCV.

projects.title: Todo App
projects.description: A Todo app where users can sign up to maintain todos, update deadlines. Filter and Search capabilities through todos. Made using Flask.

projects.title: Web based remote command runner using CGI
projects.description: A web app that can run terminal commands on a remote server using common gateway interface. Can also run docker commands through web page.

projects.title: IR Remote Controller for PC
projects.description: A Tkinter application that allows a TV remote to control Personal Computer connected via *Arduino*. Can be used to control presentations, media etc.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: A simple weather app that displays weather information using OpenWeather API.

projects.title: FreeCodeCamp's Responsive Web Design Projects
projects.description: Collection of FreeCodeCamp's Responsive Web Design Course Projects

userInfo.name: Tejas M N
userInfo.aboutInfo: I’m an aspiring Software Engineer with a passion for developing full-stack projects and exploring the depths of software engineering concepts. I’m energized by the challenge of unraveling software engineering principles and applying my insights to diverse projects. I’m starting to share my experiences and thoughts on software engineering and programming on my new blog. If you’re looking for a dedicated engineer or a collaborator for your next project, let’s connect and create something extraordinary together!
userInfo.experienceInfo: Aspiring Software Engineer from computer science background, graduated in 2023 currently working as SDET in US based product company. Proficient in web development and backend programming with expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript,  React, SQL, C#. Eager to leverage experience in development to contribute effectively to development teams in a challenging environment. Strong problem-solving skills combined with a passion for learning and adapting to new technologies.
